00174 typedef enum
00175 {
00176   /* In progress code (>0) */
00177   i2cTransferInProgress = 1,    
00179   /* Complete code (=0) */
00180   i2cTransferDone       = 0,    
00182   /* Transfer error codes (<0) */
00183   i2cTransferNack       = -1,   
00184   i2cTransferBusErr     = -2,   
00185   i2cTransferArbLost    = -3,   
00186   i2cTransferUsageFault = -4,   
00187   i2cTransferSwFault    = -5    
00188 } I2C_TransferReturn_TypeDef;

00222 #define I2C_INIT_DEFAULT                                                  \
00223 {                                                                         \
